text: Etu nisena juntu kotha khan bhabobadi Isaiah koi dise, eitu khan sob purah hoi jaise, “Tai nijor he amikhan laga sob bemar khan loi loise aru amikhan laga sob ghao khan nijor bukhi loise8.17 Tai nijor he amikhan laga sob bemar khan loi loise aru amikhan laga sob ghao khan nijor bukhi loise. Isa. 53:4.”
